name: AXChartDescriptor.ContentDirection
desc: A constant that describes the content direction of the chart.

items.name: case leftToRight
items.desc: A content direction with an X-axis that increases from left to right.

items.name: case rightToLeft
items.desc: A content direction with an X-axis that increases from right to left.

items.name: case bottomToTop
items.desc: A content direction with an X-axis that increases from bottom to top.

items.name: case topToBottom
items.desc: A content direction with an X-axis that increases from top to bottom.

items.name: case radialClockwise
items.desc: A content direction with a radial X-axis that increases clockwise.

items.name: case radialCounterClockwise
items.desc: A content direction with a radial X-axis that increases counterclockwise.
